{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Amazon Fire TV Stick (LY73PR).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Amazon_Fire_TV_Stick_(LY73PR) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Amazon |model = Fire TV Stick |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Gen 2 (LY73PR) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media streamer, computer-on-a-stick, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AE6S-0948 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT8127D; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 00:FC:8B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1, HDMI out, Alexa |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/14/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0791TX5P5 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00ZV9RDKK |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |multirev = Yes |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Fire TV Stick (Basic Edition, Gen 2) :Streaming Media Player :Alexa Voice Remote
This 2nd Generation Fire TV Stick was refreshed with a 2nd Gen Alexa Voice Remote. * First Gen Alexa Voice Remote: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00ZV9RDKK?tag=wiki085-20 B00ZV9RDKK] * Second Gen Alexa Voice Remote: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0791TX5P5?tag=wiki085-20 B0791TX5P5]
===Specifications=== [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/fire-tv/device-specifications.html Device Specifications (Amazon Fire TV)] *System on Chip (SoC) Platform: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D *CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.3GHz *GPU: Mali-450 MP4; Bluetooth: BT 4.1 (no LE) *Storage: 8GB (internal); Memory: 1GB (DDR3) *Networking: 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac (2x2 MIMO) *Ports: HDMI output, Micro USB 2.0 for power only *Device OS/Platform software: :Fire OS 5 - Based on Android 5.0 (API Level 22) *Screen resolution (px) and Refresh rate (Hz): :1920x1080 (1080p)/60Hz, 1280x720 (720p)/60Hz *HDCP: 1.4; Density (dp): 320 (1080p), 213 (720p) *Density Identifier: xhdpi (1080p), tvdpi (720p)
==See also== *[[Amazon Fire TV Devices]] â€¢ [[Amazon Echo Devices]] *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (Basic Edition)]] (November 2017) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D; GPU: Mali-450 MP4 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV (Gen 3)]] (October 2017) :SoC: [[Amlogic]] S905Z; GPU: Mali-450 MP3 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.5GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV Edition]] (May 2017) :SoC: [[MStar]]-T1 938 (MSDUAV16B-A-008T) :GPU: Mali-T820-MP3; BT 4.1, USB 2.0/3.0 :CPU: Dual Core ARM Cortex-A72 @1.5GHz :+ Dual Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.1GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (LY73PR)|Amazon Fire TV Stick (Gen 2)]] (LY73PR) (September 2016) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D; GPU: Mali-450 MP4 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV (Gen 2)]] (December 2015) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8173C; GPU: PowerVR Rogue GX6250 :CPU: Quad Core (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A72 @2GHz) :+ (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.573 GHz) big-Little *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick Gen 1 (W87CUN)]] (November 2014) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM28155 (Capri) :CPU: Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 @1GHz :GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore IV GPU/VPU (Capri VC4) *[[Amazon Fire TV (CL1130)|Amazon Fire TV (Gen 1)]] (CL1130) (April 2014) :SoC: [[Qualcomm]] APQ8064T (Snapdragon) :CPU: Quad Core Krait 300 @1.7GHz :GPU: Qualcomm Adreno 320 *[[Amazon Fire Phone (SD4930UR)]] <!-- *[[Amazon Fire TV (CL1130)]] (Gen 1) *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (LY73PR)]] (Gen 2) -->
